info.name: [SH17A] displaced noise
info.description:
I have no idea how to name it...
Based on [url=https://www.shadertoy.com/view/4sKGDV]my old shader[/url].

renderpass.code:
// Trick by pellicus and theGiallo: https://www.shadertoy.com/view/Xd2BWh
#define mainImage(C,F) C=texelFetch(iChannel0, ivec2(F), 0)
renderpass.name: Image

renderpass.code:
#define G -.01+texture(iChannel0, U
#define N texture(iChannel1, .3*floor
#define T(c,t) +.02*mix(N(t)+c), N(1.+t)+c), fract(t))
#define mainImage(C,F) vec2 U=F/iResolution.xy; C = .5*T(U, iTime*3.)T(U/60., iTime); C += G+G).xy/35.)*(1.-C)
renderpass.name: Buf A
